io.r2dbc.spi

Interface Blob


  • public interface Blob
    Represents a handle to a large binary object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Publisher<Void> discard()
      Release any resources held by the Clob when not subscribing to the stream content.
      static Blob from(Publisher<ByteBuffer> p)
      Creates a new Blob wrapper that is backed by a Publisher of ByteBuffer.
      Publisher<ByteBuffer> stream()
      Returns the content stream as a Publisher emitting ByteBuffer chunks.

    • Method Detail

      • from

        static Blob from(Publisher<ByteBuffer> p)
        Creates a new Blob wrapper that is backed by a Publisher of ByteBuffer. The wrapper subscribes and cancels the subscription immediately on discard().
        Parameters:
        p - the backing Publisher of ByteBuffer.
        Returns:
        the Blob wrapper

      • stream

        Publisher<ByteBuffer> stream()
        Returns the content stream as a Publisher emitting ByteBuffer chunks.

        The content stream can be consumed ("subscribed to") only once. Subsequent consumptions result in a IllegalStateException.

        Once subscribed, canceling the subscription releases resources associated with this Blob.

        Returns:
        a Publisher emitting ByteBuffer chunks.

      • discard

        Publisher<Void> discard()
        Release any resources held by the Clob when not subscribing to the stream content.
        Returns:
        a Publisher that termination is complete
